statements: UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET finger_length = 8.5, hand_width = 6.0 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET attendance_status = 'present' WHERE employee_id = 100 AND finger_length > 5.5
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_length = 7.2, hand_width = 6.0, finger_length = 5.4, finger_width = 3.8 WHERE id = 10
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_scan_data = '<new_hand_scan_data>' WHERE id = <id_value>
UPDATE employee_attendance SET time_out = '<new_time_out>' WHERE attendance_id = <attendance_id_value>
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_scan_data = 'new_scan_data' WHERE id = 123
UPDATE employee_attendance SET time_out = '17:00:00', date = '2023-07-15' WHERE attendance_id = 456
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_shape='Oval' WHERE employee_id=101;
UPDATE employee_attendance SET clock_in_time='08:30:00', clock_out_time='17:00:00' WHERE employee_id=201;
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_length = 15.25, hand_width = 7.5 WHERE employee_id = 101
UPDATE employee_info SET department = 'HR', first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE employee_id = 202
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_length = 10.5, hand_width = 7.3 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee_attendance SET check_out_time = '2022-11-30 17:30:00', check_in_time = '2022-11-30 09:00:00' WHERE attendance_id = 201;
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_length = 7.5, hand_width = 4.2 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE employee SET employee_role = 'Manager', employee_department = 'HR' WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_measurements = 9.8, hand_shape = 'square' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE employee_info SET supervisor = 'Manager', department = 'Sales' WHERE employee_id = 54321;
UPDATE hand_geometry_data SET hand_measurements = 8.5, hand_shape = 'Round' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE attendance_record SET time_in = '08:00:00', time_out = '17:00:00' WHERE attendance_id = 56789;
